title: Square root of a number
description: Write a programme to find square root of a number
contentHtml:
Write a programme to find square root of a number

Input  : 25
Output : 5

# Write a programme to find square root of a number

import math


def square_root(number):
    return math.sqrt(number)


number = 25
print("Input  :", number)
print("Output :", square_root(number))


# Write a programme to find square root of a number

function root(input)
  println(sqrt(input))
end

input = 25
println("Input  : ", input)
print("Output : ")
root(25)


// Write a programme to find square root of a number
#include <math.h>
#include <stdio.h>

double squareRoot(double input)
{
  double result;
  result = sqrt(input);
  printf("%f\n", result);
}

int main()
{
  int num = 25;
  printf("Input  : %d\n", num);
  printf("Output : ");
  squareRoot(num);
}


package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"math"
)



func main() {

  var input float64
  fmt.Println("Enter a float value : 5.")
  fmt.Scanln(&input)
	result := math.Sqrt(input)
	fmt.Printf("\nResult 5: %.5f", result)
	
}


//Programme to calculate square root of a number in C++

#include <stdio.h>      /* printf */
#include <math.h>       /* sqrt */

int main ()
{
  double param, result;
  param = 25.0;
  result = sqrt (param);
  printf ("sqrt(%f) = %f\n", param, result);
  return 0;
}


// Write a programme to find square root of a number

function squareRoot(number){
  return Math.sqrt(number);
}

const number = 25;

console.log("Input  : ", number);
console.log("Output : ", squareRoot(number));

// Write a programme to find square root of a number

import java.util.Scanner;

public class SquareRootOfNumber {

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
    System.out.print("Input  : ");
    double input = sc.nextDouble();
    System.out.println("Output : " + squareRootOfNumber(input));
    sc.close();
  }

  private static double squareRootOfNumber(double num) {
    return Math.sqrt(num);
  }
}


// Write a programme to find square root of a number
using System;

namespace Codinasion.Programme
{
    public class SquareRootOfNumber
    {
        public static void Main()
        {
            Console.Write("Input  : ");
            String input = Console.ReadLine();
            int x = Int32.Parse(input);
            Console.WriteLine("Output : " + Math.Sqrt(x));
        }
    }
}


<?php
/* Write a programme to find square root of a number

Input  : 25
Output : 5
 */

$user_input = readline("Input  : ");
echo ("Output  :  " . sqrt($user_input) . "\n")

?>
